text:
Christiane Eda-Pierre (March 24, 1932 – September 5, 2020) was a French coloratura soprano. She sang in many roles, from baroque to contemporary works. Eda-Pierre was born in Fort-de-France, Martinique.
She made her debut at the Opéra-Comique in 1958, as "Lakmé". She played Papagena in "The Magic Flute", and at the Palais Garnier in 1960, as "Lucia di Lammermoor".
Eda-Pierre died on September 5, 2020 at the age of 88.
